title.narrative: Prevent deterioration in the nutritional status of U5 children, boys and girls and pregnant and lactating women who are food insecure and vulnerable to undernutrition, by providing locally processed fortified foods as life-saving intervention for two and

description.narrative: The main objective is to address nutrient gaps of 217,831 children under five years of age and pregnant and lactating women to prevent nutritional deterioration during the lean season and towards the winter time, when people have no access to food production. Some 2,149 mt of food commodities wil be procured to produce fortified cereals and biscuits. 35 counties of the provinces of Ryanggang, North and South Hamgyong and North Pyongan will be targeted over the nine month implementation period.
